question: One of your friends is interested in studying abroad but confused about which course to opt for. Write a letter to your friend and in your letter:Explain which course to choose.Explain why this course is best.Invite your friend to discuss in person.
text: Hope you are doing well, I am writing this letter to suggest to you a relevant course which you can pursue in Australia. As you are aware that you have completed Hotel Management  with good marks so I recommend you to take masters in cookery course which will be more helpful to strengthen your career.

Moving further, this particular program will help to build your skills and it is one of the most demanding courses in Australia. There are many 5-star hotels where you can find a job easily. There is intake starting in September month and course fees are also a considerable not more than 10 lacs.

For more discussion I want you to visit my home this Sunday so we can have  quality time to talk about the pros and cons of the subject and finalize the plan if you like it. A part from that will eat your favourite food in a restaurant which is nearby home.
Hoping to see you on Sunday.
